name: Union of Publishers in Bulgaria
headAddress: INTERPRED WTC Sofia, 36 Dragan Tsankov blvd.
membership: UPB is a member of European Newspaper Publishers’Association (ENPA) and the World Association of Newspapers and News Publishers (WAN-IFRA).
goal:
The Union of Publishers in Bulgaria (UPB) is an independent, non-governmental and non-political body representing Press and Online media in Bulgaria.
The Union has been established to protect publisher’s freedom, professional standards and economic interest.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Information Society
euInitiatives:
EU Copyright Reform - Publishers' Right in a Digital Age
E-Privacy Directive
